name: GP Display All Category
author: Giang Peter

sections.description:
GP Display All Category help you create a Widget custom to display all your category on Sidebar or a area Widget.

Major features in GP Display All Category include:

  • Select all category for diplay.
  • Display the Widget to your Sidebar or a area Widget another.

PS: If you have any question. You can send it to me follow as my email: giangmd93@gmail.com
sections.installation:
Upload the GP Display All Category plugin to your blog, Activate it, then you go to Admin’s main Menu: Appearance/Widgets to page have all widget.

Move the GP Display All Category Widget to Area your Widget then select category. Done!
